Several eateries such as Starbucks, The Habit, Yogurtland, California Fish Grill, and Jersey Mike's Subs are also located adjacent to the property, a mere short walk away. A day at Hyatt Centric is the perfect day for work and play.

Kimpton Sylvan Hotel.description: Southern hospitality meets mid-century at the Kimpton Sylvan Hotel. Treat yourself to a day of relaxation at a boutique hidden oasis, situated in Atlanta's Buckhead area, also known as the "Beverly Hills of the South." Beat the southern heat by taking a dip in the sparkling pool, or lounge in a luxurious private suite. If you prefer a mindful nature stroll to relax, you can meander through 5,000 square feet of lush gardens. End your day sipping signature cocktails from the cheeky rooftop bar, St. Julep or indulging in delicious bites from the supper-club style restaurant.

Fairmont Austin.description: Fairmont Austin’s spacious rooftop pool offers resort-style amenities with a sophisticated city center backdrop. The expansive pool and whirlpool, situated on the 7th floor of the luxury hotel, present the perfect summer retreat. Take a dip after applying sunscreen in the onsite, state of the art, automated contactless sunscreen kiosk. Lounge poolside while enjoying complimentary Evian Mineral Water Facial spritzes, chilled towels, frozen fruit and other spontaneous pampering throughout the day.  Guests can also order from a menu of refreshing, summer-inspired cocktails and elevated, coastal Latin fare. Get some well-deserved R&R while experiencing the ultimate getaway that’s still close to home at Fairmont Austin.

Hyatt Regency Lost Pines Resort & Spa.description: Experience luxury and adventure at the incredible Hyatt Regency Lost Pines Resort. Set on 400 acres of rustic natural beauty along the banks of the lower Colorado River, the resort is a wilderness retreat with a myriad of activities for families and adults. Splash and play at the amazing water park featuring a lazy river, waterslide, and sandy beach area. For a relaxing environment, kick back at the adults-only pool or book a spa pass at Spa Django for the ultimate pampering and bliss. From horseback riding to kayaking, archery to tennis, and hiking to swimming, the resort boasts tons of activities for the entire family. A day at the Lost Pines is the perfect "daycation"!

Omni Barton Creek Resort & Spa.description: Secluded in the rolling hill country of Austin, Texas, the 4,000 acre newly-renovated Omni Barton Creek Resort & Spa is the ultimate retreat. Relax in a lounge chair or private cabana by one of the three outdoor pools, or take an invigorating soak in the whirlpool. Escape the heat with refreshing cocktails that transport you from Texas down the South American coastline at the poolside restaurant, Nopales. When hunger strikes, dive into some grilled skirt steak street-style tacos, inspired by Austin’s famous food trucks. A daycation at the Omni Barton Creek is the perfect spot to unwind and immerse yourself in a unique collection of desirable amenities.

Experience a magical production of lights and a flurry of snowflakes on Lady Bird Lawn as you celebrate the wonderment of the season. This experience is ideal for a "snowy" Texas photo op. Afterwards, enjoy the beauty of the Texas Hill Country infused with a lighted holiday trail and a glow-in-the-dark miniature golf at Santa's Magical Toy Shop.

The LINE Austin.description: Enjoy the natural views of Town Lake in the heart of downtown at the LINE Austin’s heated salt water infinity pool, complete with cold cocktails and delicious bites by sisters Reyna and Maritza Vazquez of Veracruz All Natural Mexican Food pop-up. Order a cocktail and a swim before the best vista in town in the LINE’s lakeside pool. Overlooking the Ann W. Richards Congress Avenue Bridge, Town Lake and the lush Austin skyline, it’s a spot that will make you forget you’re in the heart of the city.

Lakeway Resort and Spa.description: Enjoy a day on the lake at Lakeway Resort & Spa. Situated on picturesque Lake Travis, you'll feel a world away, just 25 minutes from downtown Austin. The little ones will love the dedicated kids’ pool with a waterslide and splash pad while the kids-at-heart can enjoy the adults pool and swim-up bar, with sweeping views over Lake Travis. With poolside food and beverage service and the TR Restaurant & Bar, no one leaves hungry. For the ultimate experience, make it a day to remember with a private cabana rental where you can relax in your home-base while the whole family enjoys the resort.

Sit under an umbrella (after all, too much sun just causes wrinkles!) while you enjoy a day of fun in the sun for the whole family.

A first of its kind retreat, this property offers an edgy and sophisticated experience, complete with rooftop views of the city skyline and fine dining that showcases the region’s tropical flavors. Soak up the Florida sun next to the saltwater pool or indulge in a hand-made cocktail from the open-air cafe, Sip ’n Dip. Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort.description: Inspired by the legendary singer Jimmy Buffett, Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort is the ultimate tropical escape. With two unique pools, FlowRider Wave machine and a swirling waterslide, Margaritaville offers fun-filled activities the whole family will love. Enjoy a frosty margarita or a delicious meal at famous, fun-themed restaurants such as Jimmy Buffett’s Margaritaville, LandShark Bar & Grill and the 5 o’ Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill. Indulge your senses and book a Spa Pass to enjoy soothing amenities including a indoor jacuzzi, relaxation lounge, steam room, fitness center, complimentary tea and more. Whether you prefer lounging in a full-service Cabana, sipping a cocktail poolside or catching waves on the FlowRider, Margaritaville is a child and adult's ideal paradise.

With two sparkling pools and a renowned Spa, the Carillon Miami is a dream tropical getaway. Start your daycation in the Relaxation Lounge or with a dip in the beautiful Atlantic rooftop pool. InterContinental Miami.description: Treat yourself to a premier luxury experience in tropical paradise at the InterContinental Miami. Built around Henry Moore’s famous sculpture, “The Spindle,” the hotel lies along the downtown waterfront, overlooking beautiful Biscayne Bay. Offering luxurious pool and spa amenities, the beautiful waterfront oasis has all the elements for a perfect vacation day.  Enjoy a refreshing swim in the rooftop pool or lounge the day away in the Florida sunshine, while sipping delicious cocktails from the poolside bar, Bluewater. A day spent at the InterContinental Miami is the ultimate retreat!

Take a dip in the 72-foot pool, and make sure to wave to those in the lobby below when swimming over the pool floor window. Relax in a private shaded daybed, while enjoying poolside service from Serena - a lushly planted open-air Mexican restaurant overlooking South Beach offering hand-crafted cocktails and shareable dishes. Head to the rooftop for a lounge pool with submerged chaises, daybeds, swings, and the Upside bar for delicious drinks complete with epic panoramic views of Miami Beach. A day at the Grand Beach Hotel is the ultimate daycation of fun in the sun!

Freehand Miami.description: Located close to South Beach, a free-spirited, lush paradise awaits at Freehand Miami. Relax poolside as you sip on delicious craft cocktails from Broken Shaker and  explore the Shaker’s diverse street-food inspired menu and vast selection of ingenious cocktails composed of elixirs, syrups and infusions made from garden herbs & spices and exotic ingredients from around the world. Parents can lounge in the Florida sunshine, while kids splash, play, and slide. Delicious food can be found at 27 Palms, with patio seating and fire pits at night. For a more upscale experience, book a poolside cabana featuring a shaded canopy, comfortable lounge chairs, a mini-fridge, ceiling fan and TV. At Sheraton Orlando Lake Buena Vista Resort , there is fun for the whole family!

With two sparkling pools, a fully equipped fitness center and a rejuvenating spa, Hyatt Regency Orlando is the perfect escape. Sip a refreshing cocktail while lounging poolside or take a ride down the windy slide. For a more relaxing experience, book a Spa Pass and and decompress in the relaxation lounge and steam room. Whether you prefer to make a splash or unwind at the spa, a ResortPass to the Hyatt Regency Orlando is the ultimate getaway.

Element Orlando International Drive.description: Spend a day in style at the modern Element Orlando International Drive hotel, steps away from SeaWorld, Discovery Cove, and Aquatica, and a short drive away from Universal Studios and Walt Disney World. Take a dip in the saltwater pool, and relax with a cocktail on the outdoor patio with fire pit. Share your adventures over a glass of organic wine at the WXYZ bar or grab snacks to-go from the Restore Pantry. If a work-cation is what you need, settle into a day room featuring modern-style decor, work desk, and high-speed wireless internet. You can also connect to the office at the Element's tech-forward workstation. The Element Orlando is the perfect place to work and play!

If you get tired from all the fun in the sun,  sit back and relax with delicious food and beverage options from Calypso Bar & Grille. There is something for everyone at Caribe Royale!

Courtyard by Marriott Orlando Lake Buena.description: Experience a magical daycation at Courtyard Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village, minutes from Disney World's Epcot®, Universal Orlando Resort™, Disney Springs® and Discovery Cove®. Explore the expansive complex and amenities the property has to offer, including an indoor/outdoor pool separated by a waterfall surrounded by swaying palm trees, and the 24-hour fitness center. Relax by the pool, or soak your cares away in the hot tub, while kids have a blast at the splash pad and playground. The Bistro provides delicious food and drinks at any time of day, from buffet breakfasts to all-American classics, and a daily Happy Hour from 5pm-7pm. For quick snacks, bites, and coffee, head the lobby market. Whether here with family or friends, the Courtyard Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village is the place for an unforgettable day.

Holiday Inn Resort Orlando Suites - Wate.description: Experience unlimited amounts of fun at the Holiday Inn Resort Orlando Suites-Waterpark. This family friendly resort is home to a large water park with a sparkling pool, water slides, fun poolside activities, and experienced lifeguards that are always on duty. Dive in to the Olympic-sized pool, slide down fast-paced flumes or splash in the kid's play area. Wade in to the zero-depth entry pool, test your mettle on the four-story water tower, or relax in two jacuzzis. After a day of fun in the sun, test your skills at the Bank Heist Laser Challenge.

Kids of all ages will have a blast at this Orlando resort, where high-speed slides and kiddie slides are ready to ride, side-by-side. Omni Orlando Resort.description: Relax and splash around at the Omni Orlando Resort at ChampionsGate. Enjoy ultimate outdoor fun at Omni Orlando Resort, featuring Orlando's only resort wave pool,  family pool with a 125-foot corkscrew waterslide, adults-only pool, and lazy river. Escape to a private cabana and then sharpen your game on the Champions 9, Par 3 Golf Experience, lighted for nighttime play. An array of delicious cuisine is always on the menu, with ten unique restaurants and lounges including authentic Chinese cuisine and sushi at Zen; the open-Italian kitchen of Trevi’s; and David’s Club, serving bourbon, steaks and craft cocktails. From riding waves to unwinding at the spa, shooting hoops to playing miniature golf, the Omni Resort at ChampionsGate has fun-filled activities the whole family will love.

The hotels soundproof newly renovated rooms invite you to work in peace and enjoy amazing runway views, all just an escalator ride from the airport security checkpoints. Take a refreshing dip and relax with fresh salads and appetizers, cool cocktails and signature sandwiches from the room service menu.
